My most valued possession is my sports jersey
i hate tacos.

participant_2.background:
My internal arguments are often more interesting than my conversations with others.
I'm not so worried about the weather because I don't have kids.
I practice my guitar for hours every day, hoping to make it big in the local music scene.
i wait for something interesting to happen each day.
My weight is 160 pounds.

content.text: Hi! Not much, just practicing my guitar.
Oh cool, what kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different kinds of music, but mostly rock and blues.
Nice, I love rock music. What's your favorite band?
I'm a big fan of The Beatles.
Oh, me too! They're my favorite band of all time.
They're so good. I love their music and their lyrics.
Me too. I love how they can write songs about anything and make it sound so beautiful.
They're really talented. I wish I could play guitar like George Harrison.
Me too! He's an amazing guitarist.
I'm getting better, but I'm not quite there yet.
Keep practicing! You'll get there eventually.
